 2054:     code:purge(?TESTMOD),
 2055:     true = code:delete(?TESTMOD),
 2056:     not_loaded = code:module_status(?TESTMOD), % deleted
 2057: 
 2058:     %% recompilation ignores timestamps, only md5 matters
 2059:     load_code(),
 2060:     compile_beam(1100),
 2061:     loaded = code:module_status(?TESTMOD),
 2062: 
 2063:     %% modifying module detects different md5
 2064:     make_source_file(<<"1">>),
 2065:     compile_beam(0),
 2066:     modified = code:module_status(?TESTMOD),
 2067: 
 2068:     %% loading the modified code from disk makes it loaded
 2069:     load_code(),
 2070:     loaded = code:module_status(?TESTMOD),
 2071: 
 2072:     %% removing and recreating a module with same md5
 2073:     remove_code(),
 2074:     removed = code:module_status(?TESTMOD),
 2075:     compile_beam(0),
 2076:     loaded = code:module_status(?TESTMOD),
 2077: 
 2078:     ok.
 2079: 
 2080: compile_beam(Sleep) ->
 2081:     compile(Sleep, []).
 2082: 
 2083: compile(Sleep, Opts) ->
 2084:     timer:sleep(Sleep),  % increment compilation timestamp
 2085:     {ok,?TESTMOD} = compile:file(?TESTMODSRC, Opts).
 2086: 
 2087: load_code() ->
 2088:     code:purge(?TESTMOD),
 2089:     {module,?TESTMOD} = code:load_file(?TESTMOD).
 2090: 
 2091: remove_code() ->
 2092:     ok = file:delete(?TESTMODOBJ).
 2093: 
 2094: make_source_file(Body) ->
 2095:     ok = file:write_file(?TESTMODSRC, dummy_source(Body)).
 2096: 
 2097: dummy_source(Body) ->
 2098:     [<<"-module(" ?TESTMODSTR ").\n"
 2099:        "-export([f/0]).\n"
 2100:        "f() -> ">>, Body, <<".\n">>].
 2101: 
 2102: dummy_ast() ->
 2103:     dummy_ast(?TESTMODSTR).
 2104: 
 2105: dummy_ast(Mod) when is_atom(Mod) ->
 2106:     dummy_ast(atom_to_list(Mod));
 2107: dummy_ast(ModStr) ->
 2108:     [scan_form("-module(" ++ ModStr ++ ")."),
 2109:      scan_form("-export([f/0])."),
 2110:      scan_form("f() -> ok.")].
 2111: 
 2112: scan_form(String) ->
 2113:     {ok,Ts,_} = erl_scan:string(String),
 2114:     {ok,F} = erl_parse:parse_form(Ts),
 2115:     F.
 2116: 
 2117: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 2118: %% error_logger handler.
 2119: %% (Copied from stdlib/test/proc_lib_SUITE.erl.)
 2120: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 2121: init(Tester) ->
 2122:     {ok, Tester}.
 2123: 
 2124: handle_event({warning_msg, _GL, Msg}, Tester) ->
 2125:     Tester ! Msg,
 2126:     {ok, Tester};
 2127: handle_event(_Event, State) ->
 2128:     {ok, State}.
 2129: 
 2130: handle_info(_, State) ->
 2131:     {ok, State}.
 2132: 
 2133: handle_call(_Query, State) -> {ok, {error, bad_query}, State}.
 2134: 
 2135: terminate(_Reason, State) ->
 2136:     State.
 2137: 
 2138: %%%
 2139: %%% Common utility functions.
 2140: %%%
 2141: 
 2142: run_purge_test(Test, Config) ->
 2143:     OSRL = erlang:system_info(outstanding_system_requests_limit),
 2144:     
 2145:     TestLowOSRL = case OSRL < 10 of
 2146:                       true -> 1;
 2147:                       false -> 5
 2148:                   end,
 2149: 
 2150:     io:format("Running with the default outstanding request limit of ~p~n", [OSRL]),
 2151:     Res1 = Test(Config),
 2152:     io:format("Result: ~p~n", [Res1]),
 2153:     try
 2154:         %% Run again with low limit and many processes...
 2155:         Procs = case erlang:system_info(process_limit) of
 2156:                     PLim when PLim < 20000 ->
 2157:                         erlang:system_info(process_limit) div 2;
 2158:                     _ ->
 2159:                         10000
 2160:                 end,
 2161:         erlang:system_flag(outstanding_system_requests_limit, TestLowOSRL),
 2162:         io:format("Running with outstanding request limit of ~p~n", [TestLowOSRL]),
 2163:         Ps = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 2164:                                spawn_link(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end)
 2165:                        end, lists:seq(1, Procs)),
 2166:         Res2 = Test(Config),
 2167:         lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 2168:                               unlink(P),
 2169:                               exit(P, kill)
 2170:                       end, Ps),
 2171:         lists:foreach(fun (P) -> is_process_alive(P) end, Ps),
 2172:         io:format("Result: ~p~n", [Res2]),
 2173:         {Res1, Res2}
 2174:     after
 2175:         TestLowOSRL = erlang:system_flag(outstanding_system_requests_limit, OSRL)
 2176:     end.
